etymology.interpretation: The character visually represents a human eye, conveying the idea of sight. The intuitive sense comes from its direct resemblance to the shape and features of an eye.

examples.chinese: 他的眼睛很大(他的眼睛很大)！
examples.pinyin: tā de yǎnjing hěn dà(他的眼睛很大)！

examples.chinese: 我看到了眼睛(我看到了眼睛)！
examples.pinyin: wǒ kàn dào le yǎnjing(我看到了眼睛)！

examples.chinese: 那只鸟的眼睛非常美(那隻鳥的眼睛非常美)。
examples.pinyin: nà zhī niǎo de yǎnjing fēicháng měi(那隻鳥的眼睛非常美)。
examples.english: The bird's eyes are very beautiful.
